title: Warwickshire Restaurant Chain Website
description:
Complete website redesign and digital marketing strategy for a prominent Warwickshire-based restaurant chain. The project included a modern, responsive website with online booking system and menu management.

Our digital marketing campaign increased their online visibility and bookings by 150% within six months.
delivered: Modern responsive website, integrated booking system, SEO optimization, and ongoing digital marketing support resulting in significant business growth.
strategy: Comprehensive digital strategy combining local SEO, targeted social media campaigns, and user-friendly website design to enhance the client's online presence.
design: Clean, modern design focusing on visual appeal and user experience, with easy navigation and clear calls-to-action.
development: Custom WordPress development with advanced booking integration, menu management system, and mobile-first approach.

title: Local Artisan Marketplace
description:
Created a bespoke e-commerce platform for Warwickshire artisans to sell their handcrafted products online. The platform includes secure payment processing, vendor management, and customer accounts.

Successfully launched with 50+ local vendors and achieved Â£100,000+ in sales within the first quarter.
delivered: Custom e-commerce platform, vendor portal, marketing strategy, and ongoing technical support ensuring smooth operations.
strategy: Focused on creating a community-driven marketplace that supports local businesses while providing a seamless shopping experience.
design: Intuitive interface design showcasing product photography and vendor stories, with easy product discovery and checkout process.
development: Built on WooCommerce with custom plugins for multi-vendor functionality and advanced inventory management.

title: Startup Brand Launch
description:
Complete brand development and digital launch for a Warwickshire tech startup. Created comprehensive brand identity and implemented multi-channel marketing strategy.

Achieved over 10,000 social media followers and significant market presence within three months.
delivered: Brand guidelines, social media strategy, content creation, and marketing materials that established a strong market presence.
strategy: Integrated approach to brand building combining traditional and digital channels to reach target audience effectively.
design: Modern brand identity design with consistent visual elements across all platforms and marketing materials.
development: Development of brand assets and marketing collateral, including social media templates and email marketing systems.

title: Property Management Portal
description:
Developed a custom web application for a leading Warwickshire property management company. The system streamlines property listings, tenant management, and maintenance requests.

Reduced administrative workload by 60% and improved tenant satisfaction scores.
delivered: Full-featured property management system with user-friendly interfaces for both staff and tenants.
strategy: User-centered design approach focusing on simplifying complex property management processes.
design: Clean, intuitive interface design with dashboard views tailored to different user roles.
development: Custom web application built with modern frameworks, featuring real-time updates and automated workflows.

title: Retail Chain Marketing Campaign
description:
Executed a comprehensive digital marketing campaign for a Warwickshire retail chain, including SEO, PPC, and social media marketing.

Generated 200% ROI on ad spend and increased foot traffic to physical stores by 75%.
delivered: Integrated marketing campaign, conversion tracking, and detailed analytics reporting showing clear ROI.
strategy: Multi-channel approach combining local SEO, targeted PPC campaigns, and social media engagement.
design: Eye-catching ad creatives and landing pages optimized for conversion.
development: Implementation of tracking systems and custom reporting dashboards for campaign monitoring.

title: Boutique Online Store
description:
Created a custom e-commerce solution for a high-end Warwickshire boutique, featuring integrated inventory management and personalized shopping experiences.

Achieved 300% increase in online sales within the first year.
delivered: Fully responsive e-commerce website with advanced features including personalized recommendations and loyalty program.
strategy: Focus on creating a premium online shopping experience that reflects the boutique's high-end brand.
design: Elegant, minimalist design showcasing products with high-quality imagery and smooth user interactions.
development: Custom Shopify development with bespoke features and third-party integrations.
